title: BRIEF-Anna Kowalska's stake in BPX decreases after capital increase
text:
BRIEF-Anna Kowalska's stake in BPX decreases after capital increase Sept 4 
Sept 4 BPX SA : 
* Anna Kowalska's stake in company decreases to 1.31 pct from 7.47 pct after capital increase 
* The number of shares owned by Kowalska has not changed and totals 266,023 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters 
Thomson Reuters is the world's largest international multimedia news agency, providing investing news , world news , business news , technology news , headline news, small business news , news alerts, personal finance , stock market , and mutual funds information available on Reuters.com, video , mobile , and interactive television platforms.
